entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
